00025 using System;
00026 using MathNet.Numerics.Properties;
00027 
00028 namespace MathNet.Numerics.LinearAlgebra
00029 {
00038     [Serializable]
00039     public class CholeskyDecomposition
00040     {
00042         Matrix _l;
00043 
00045         readonly bool _isSymmetricPositiveDefinite;
00046 
00050         public
00051         CholeskyDecomposition(
00052             Matrix m
00053             )
00054         {
00055             if(m.RowCount != m.ColumnCount)
00056             {
00057                 throw new InvalidOperationException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSquare);
00058             }
00059 
00060             double[][] A = m;
00061             double[][] L = Matrix.CreateMatrixData(m.RowCount, m.RowCount);
00062 
00063             _isSymmetricPositiveDefinite = true; // ensure square
00064 
00065             for(int i = 0; i < L.Length; i++)
00066             {
00067                 double diagonal = 0.0;
00068                 for(int j = 0; j < i; j++)
00069                 {
00070                     double sum = A[i][j];
00071                     for(int k = 0; k < j; k++)
00072                     {
00073                         sum -= L[j][k] * L[i][k];
00074                     }
00075 
00076                     L[i][j] = sum /= L[j][j];
00077                     diagonal += sum * sum;
00078 
00079                     _isSymmetricPositiveDefinite &= (A[j][i] == A[i][j]); // ensure symmetry
00080                 }
00081 
00082                 diagonal = A[i][i] - diagonal;
00083                 L[i][i] = Math.Sqrt(Math.Max(diagonal, 0.0));
00084 
00085                 _isSymmetricPositiveDefinite &= (diagonal > 0.0); // ensure positive definite
00086 
00087                 // zero out resulting upper triangle.
00088                 for(int j = i + 1; j < L.Length; j++)
00089                 {
00090                     L[i][j] = 0.0;
00091                 }
00092             }
00093 
00094             _l = new Matrix(L);
00095         }
00096 
00099         public bool IsSPD
00100         {
00101             // TODO: NUnit test
00102             get { return _isSymmetricPositiveDefinite; }
00103         }
00104 
00107         [Obsolete("Use the TriangularFactor property instead")]
00108         public
00109         Matrix
00110         GetL()
00111         {
00112             return _l;
00113         }
00114 
00118         public Matrix TriangularFactor
00119         {
00120             get { return _l; }
00121         }
00122 
00128         public
00129         Vector
00130         Solve(
00131             Vector b
00132             )
00133         {
00134             if(b.Length != _l.RowCount)
00135             {
00136                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSameRowDimension, "b");
00137             }
00138 
00139             if(!_isSymmetricPositiveDefinite)
00140             {
00141                 throw new InvalidOperationException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSymmetricPositiveDefinite);
00142             }
00143 
00144             double[][] L = _l;
00145             double[] bb = b;
00146             double[] x = new double[b.Length];
00147 
00148             // Solve L*y = b
00149             for(int i = 0; i < x.Length; i++)
00150             {
00151                 double sum = bb[i];
00152                 for(int k = i - 1; k >= 0; k--)
00153                 {
00154                     sum -= L[i][k] * x[k];
00155                 }
00156 
00157                 x[i] = sum / L[i][i];
00158             }
00159 
00160             // Solve L'*x = y
00161             for(int i = x.Length - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00162             {
00163                 double sum = x[i];
00164                 for(int k = i + 1; k < x.Length; k++)
00165                 {
00166                     sum -= L[k][i] * x[k];
00167                 }
00168 
00169                 x[i] = sum / L[i][i];
00170             }
00171 
00172             return new Vector(x);
00173         }
00174 
00180         public
00181         Matrix
00182         Solve(
00183             Matrix B
00184             )
00185         {
00186             if(B.RowCount != _l.RowCount)
00187             {
00188                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSameRowDimension, "B");
00189             }
00190 
00191             if(!_isSymmetricPositiveDefinite)
00192             {
00193                 throw new InvalidOperationException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSymmetricPositiveDefinite);
00194             }
00195 
00196             int nx = B.ColumnCount;
00197             double[][] L = _l;
00198             double[][] BB = B;
00199             double[][] X = Matrix.CreateMatrixData(L.Length, nx);
00200 
00201             // Solve L*Y = B
00202             for(int i = 0; i < X.Length; i++)
00203             {
00204                 for(int j = 0; j < nx; j++)
00205                 {
00206                     double sum = BB[i][j];
00207 
00208                     for(int k = i - 1; k >= 0; k--)
00209                     {
00210                         sum -= L[i][k] * X[k][j];
00211                     }
00212 
00213                     X[i][j] = sum / L[i][i];
00214                 }
00215             }
00216 
00217             // Solve L'*x = y
00218             for(int i = X.Length - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00219             {
00220                 for(int j = 0; j < nx; j++)
00221                 {
00222                     double sum = X[i][j];
00223 
00224                     for(int k = i + 1; k < X.Length; k++)
00225                     {
00226                         sum -= L[k][i] * X[k][j];
00227                     }
00228 
00229                     X[i][j] = sum / L[i][i];
00230                 }
00231             }
00232 
00233             return new Matrix(X);
00234         }
00235     }
00236 }
